metadata.title: Inteli - Innovative Technology Education
metadata.description: Discover Inteli, the college that trains technology leaders with 100% project-based learning and a strong connection to the job market.

content_blocks.text:
Process
Inteli Selection Process2026: The best news of the year has arrived!
MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business

content_blocks.text: The program that connects technology with strategy and business to transform your career. Start date: February/2026 Our campus Take a closer look at our infrastructure, where innovation happens. Inteli Blog Read our articles and immerse yourself in the world of technology, innovation, and business.
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business

content_blocks.text: At Inteli, teaching has a different logic
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: At Inteli, teaching has a different logic

content_blocks.text: 5 times top grade from MEC
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: At Inteli, teaching has a different logic

content_blocks.text: We got top marks from the Ministry of Education (MEC) in all five undergraduate courses: Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, Software Engineering and ADM Tech.
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: At Inteli, teaching has a different logic

content_blocks.text: Official recognition attests to the quality of our pedagogical model, infrastructure and teaching staff. More than that, it validates the bold proposal of a 100% real project-based college, in direct connection with the challenges of the market and society
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: At Inteli, teaching has a different logic

content_blocks.text: Methodology: learning by doing
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: At Inteli, teaching has a different logic

content_blocks.text: Here at Inteli, technology and impact go hand in hand from the first day of school. Through Project-Based Learning (PBL), our students face real challenges proposed by companies and organizations from different sectors, always with the close supervision of teachers and specialists. It is in practice that they develop technical skills, a systemic vision and professional maturity.
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: At Inteli, teaching has a different logic

content_blocks.text: Career, Leadership and Employability: three pillars, one destination
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: At Inteli, teaching has a different logic

content_blocks.text: At Inteli, employability is taken seriously from day one. We are the only college in Brazil with a team of specialists focused on career development right from the start. At the Center for Development and Leadership, students can count on personalized mentoring, preparation for the market and a curriculum dedicated to leadership training - with a focus on soft skills, strategic vision and decision-making. More than training talent, CDL prepares leaders ready to transform the world.
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: At Inteli, teaching has a different logic

content_blocks.text: Protagonism: you choose, Inteli empowers
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: At Inteli, teaching has a different logic

content_blocks.text: In the fourth year, each Inteli student chooses the path that most closely connects with their future: Entrepreneurial, Academic or Corporate. Throughout the year, Inteli leads, guides and enhances this journey with specialized mentoring, strategic support and connections with the market. Here, forming leaders means walking together - from plan to realization.
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: At Inteli, teaching has a different logic

content_blocks.text: State-of-the-art infrastructure
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: At Inteli, teaching has a different logic

content_blocks.text: Our campus is more than a learning space: it's an ecosystem of innovation, collaboration and well-being. With more than 10,000 m², it brings together workshops for active methodologies, makerspaces, meeting rooms, a library, communal areas, a restaurant, an outdoor gym and much more. Each environment has been designed to inspire creativity, promote the exchange of ideas and boost the protagonism of our students. Here, infrastructure is synonymous with an excellent experience.
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: At Inteli, teaching has a different logic

content_blocks.text: Our courses: the future can be learned here!
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Our courses: the future can be learned here!

content_blocks.text: Undergraduate Programs
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Our courses: the future can be learned here!

content_blocks.text: At Inteli, we offer five four-year face-to-face bachelor's degrees that combine theory and practice from the first day of class. Our Project-Based Learning methodology allows you to develop skills in Computing, Business and Leadership to meet the challenges of the future.
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Our courses: the future can be learned here!

content_blocks.text: Executive Courses
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Our courses: the future can be learned here!

content_blocks.text: The Compass, AI for Business and Data Science for Decision Makers executive courses were created for leaders and professionals who want to transform their results with the latest in artificial intelligence, data science and innovation. Here, productivity becomes competitive advantage, data becomes strategic decisions, and technology becomes a direct ally of your business impact.
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Our courses: the future can be learned here!

content_blocks.text: Basic Education
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Our courses: the future can be learned here!

content_blocks.text: Inteli believes that the future of education starts now. That's why we've developed programs and projects aimed at primary education that bring students closer to the world of technology, innovation and entrepreneurship in a practical, inspiring and transformative way. Our programs are built using active methodologies, such as Project-Based Learning (PBL), and integrate knowledge trails in technology, business and human skills.
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Our courses: the future can be learned here!

content_blocks.text: Transforming Brazil with excellence and innovation
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Transforming Brazil with excellence and innovation

content_blocks.text: Founded by Roberto Sallouti and André Esteves, Inteli was born with the mission of training leaders who will transform Brazil through technology.
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Transforming Brazil with excellence and innovation

content_blocks.text: Choosing Inteli means investing in a solid future, with purpose, with excellence and with the certainty of being in the most promising ecosystem for technology education in Latin America.
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Transforming Brazil with excellence and innovation

content_blocks.text: 90+project partnercompaniesand685+ prototypesdeveloped
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: 90+project partnercompaniesand685+ prototypesdeveloped

content_blocks.text: During their degree, each student develops 16 real projects with leading companies, putting what they learn into practice. This is how we train professionals who are ready to make a real impact.
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: 90+project partnercompaniesand685+ prototypesdeveloped

content_blocks.text: Stories from those who live theInteli experience
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Stories from those who live theInteli experience

content_blocks.text: Follow a day with Bernardo, an Information Systems student, and see how Inteli combines theory and practice to train innovation leaders from the first day of class. What happens when a student joins AWS?
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Stories from those who live theInteli experience

content_blocks.text: Kathlyn Diwan, an Inteli student, shows how her undergraduate projects have prepared her to apply technology strategically in the day-to-day running of AWS. The world's most innovative method: hands-on!
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Stories from those who live theInteli experience

content_blocks.text: At Inteli, theory and practice come together from day one. Each project is a real opportunity to learn what the market demands with purpose and impact.
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Stories from those who live theInteli experience

content_blocks.text: It's BUSINESS with Roberto Sallouti, co-founder of Inteli and CEO of BTG Pactual
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Inteli in the Media

content_blocks.text: In an interview with journalist Carlos Sambrana, Roberto Sallouti shares the vision behind Inteli, the concrete impact on the students' careers and how the projects developed are accelerating technological progress in Brazil.
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business

content_blocks.text: The future doesn't just fit on the blackboard anymore
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Inteli in the Media

content_blocks.text: "The university can no longer be an end in itself - it needs to be the beginning of multiple possible futures," writes Maira Habimorad, CEO of Inteli.

content_blocks.text: Inteli gets top marks from MEC in all 5 courses offered
content_blocks.section: MBA in AI and Data for Business
content_blocks.subsection: Inteli in the Media

content_blocks.text: The recognition attests to the academic excellence of Inteli, which is three years old and graduates its first class at the end of this year.
